trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> 的颜色空间。

trans-unit.source: For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 XAML 用法的信息，请参阅[ColorConvertedBitmap 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>发出信号初始化已开始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>发出信号初始化已完成。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 使用创建的对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>构造函数将自动初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> is never cached.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>永远不会缓存。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> and use it to convert color.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>并用它来将彩色位图转换。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 若要初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is converted.
trans-unit.target: 已转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the source bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 源位图的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 已转换位图的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 已转换位图的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class by using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> 使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化的实例<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 初始化开始。

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 必须之间执行属性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>已初始化，将忽略属性更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>与一组使用的属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 当前正被初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: 已调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the color profile, as defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> class, of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标识已转换位图的颜色配置文件（由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 类定义）的值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
trans-unit.target: 进行到属性更改时<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>，更改必须完成内<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A>块。
